title: Papyrus Bodmer
additional-notes: This is a Swiss publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

These are edited volumes that publish and comment on the Bodmer Papyri, a group of ancient manuscripts found in Egypt.  Most of the copyright registrations specify that the copyright applies to the commentary and analysis.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
